臥せる: (ふせる) - to lie down; to retire; to go to bed
臥ゆ: (こゆ) - (v2y-k,vi)  (usu. in compounds) to lie down
臥待月: (ふしまちづき) - moon of the 19th day of the lunar month
臥竜: (がりょう) - unrecognized genius/exceptional person hidden among the masses; reclining dragon

臥龍: (がりょう) - unrecognized genius/exceptional person hidden among the masses; reclining dragon
臥龍点睛: (がりゅうてんせい) - (yoji) finishing touch; completing (something) by executing the final, critical step
臨く: (のぞく) - to peek (though a keyhole, gap, etc.); to look down into (a ravine, etc.); to peek into (a shop, bookstore, etc.); to sneak a look at/to take a quick look at; to peep (through a telescope, microscope, etc.); to stick out (a scarf from a collar, etc.)/to peek through (sky through a forest canopy, etc.); (esp. 臨く)  to face

自: (ji/shi/mizuka) - oneself , self-; from ...; this ... (in contrast to some other ...), aforementioned
